'''"Tequemecan Ingenuity"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Tequemecan Ingenuity" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Teticpac Peak}} after lighting two torches.
<gallery>
Item Tequemecan Ingenuity Location.png|Map location
Item Tequemecan Ingenuity Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Flammabomb Wood = 6
|Iron Chunk = 2
|Fabric = 4
|sort = Flammabomb Wood;Iron Chunk;Fabric
}}
